text: Gunaabhweninji bhandunji bhawilenje bhakulungwanji na bhashoko, bhajimingene mmujo ja shitengu sha ukulungwa, na itabhu gwiunukwilwe. Na shitabhu shina, yani shitabhu sha gumi, na shenesho gushiunukwilwe. Bhandunji bhawilenje gubhaukumulwenje ga itendi yabhonji, malinga shiijandikwe mwitabhu mula.
